name: Budget Planner
description: Helps users plan monthly budgets, categorize expenses, and set savings goals.

skills.name: Plan Budget
skills.description: Given monthly income and expenses, suggest a simple allocation for savings, fixed, and variable expenses.
examples: Help me plan a budget with 4000 income, 1800 rent and bills, 800 other expenses.
Suggest how much I should save each month if I earn 2500.
I want to save 20% of my income, how should I split the rest between fixed and variable expenses?

skills.name: Summarize Expenses
skills.description: Summarize and categorize a list of expenses into totals and categories.
examples: Here are my expenses for the month, summarize them by category.
Tell me how much I spent on food, transport, and entertainment.
